TestDescription.name: Apache httpd remote denial of service

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: A denial of service vulnerability has been found in the way the multiple overlapping ranges are handled by the Apache HTTPD server: [break][break] http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2011/Aug/175 [break][break] An attack tool is circulating in the wild. Active use of this tools has been observed. The attack can be done remotely and with a modest number of requests can cause very significant memory and CPU usage on the server. [break][break] [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]Affected Apache versions (1.3.x, 2.0.x through 2.0.64, and 2.2.x through 2.2.19).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Apache HTTP Server (2.2.20 or later), available from the Apache HTTP Server Project Web site.

Reference.database: Apache httpd Remote Denial of Service (memory exhaustion)
